Get access to the Vega APIs, contribute: Get access to the Vega APIs, contribute to the source code, earn bounties and be rewarded for building the future of DeFi.
Rewards are paid out from the treasury a: Rewards are paid out from the treasury at the end of an epoch.
Any Vega network participant with assets: Any Vega network participant with assets can use the rewards functionality to incentivise behaviours they would like to see in a market for trading, liquidity provision.
Nominate a validator and earn treasury r: Nominate a validator and earn treasury rewards for each full epoch staked, as well as a share of trading fees.
Participate in developer bounties and ge: Participate in developer bounties and get rewarded for your commitment.
Found a software security issue? Report: Found a software security issue? Report it to us and earn rewards by finding bugs that affect the Vega Network.
Earn rewards for helping to find bugs an: Earn rewards for helping to find bugs and battle harden Vega's Testnet.
